messages.title: Felicity Owen The Best Choice for St Austell & Newquay

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Since 2010 the NHS has seen the highest treatment wait lists and record levels of 'bed blocking'. As a doctor, Felicity Owen will tackle these issues in St. Austell and Newquay.

Labour will always be on the side of pensioners. Only Labour will guarantee the state pension triple lock, the intergenerational and fuel benefits to ensure a dignified retirement and free bus passes for those above 75.

The sheer scale of the climate crisis demands radical ambitious policies: public ownership of large-scale investment in renewable energy and a commitment to net zero emissions by 2030. In the process, many new green jobs will be created up and down the country.

issues.health: Since 2010 the NHS has seen the largest treatment wait lists and record levels of 'bed blocking'. As a doctor, Felicity Owen will tackle these issues in St. Austell and Newquay.

endorsements.endorsement: I could never support the austerity the Conservatives have wilfully insisted on. Time and again they promised to scrap them, then voted for worse than before. I am retired - I know what it's like worrying about your home and having to pay for your care. I'm voting for Felicity because Labour stands up for us. 'Green and pleasant land' will be green again under Felicity's and Labour's care.

quotes.text: Green and pleasant land' will be green again under Felicity's and Labour's care.
